Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor to continuously track the health and performance of Stream Analytics jobs. Identify and resolve any anomalies or failures in real-time.
Regularly check the connectivity and integrity of input data sources, such as Event Hubs, IoT Hub, or Blob Storage, to ensure uninterrupted data flow.
Review and optimize Stream Analytics queries to ensure efficient processing and minimal latency. Use query performance metrics for adjustments.
Conduct failover tests to verify the resiliency of Stream Analytics jobs in case of regional outages or service disruptions.
Review and update security policies for Stream Analytics jobs, including access controls and encryption settings, to align with organizational security standards.
Conduct regular audits of Stream Analytics job configurations to ensure compliance with best practices and documented architecture.
Keep Stream Analytics job documentation up-to-date, including operational procedures, query configurations, and troubleshooting guides.
Regularly back up Stream Analytics job configurations to ensure quick recovery in case of accidental changes or failures.
Validate the integrity and accuracy of output data sent to destinations like Power BI, SQL Database, or Blob Storage.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare the team for potential failures or security incidents in Stream Analytics jobs.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding Stream Analytics job performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new Stream Analytics features, best practices, and security measures.
